content.question: Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Compare and contrast the political ideas of Hobbes and Locke.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Compare and contrast the political ideas of Hobbes and Locke.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
